description: Falcon is a causal decoder-only model built by Technology Innovation Institute (TII) and trained on more than 1 trillion tokens of RefinedWeb enhanced with curated corpora. It was built using custom-built tooling for data pre-processing and model training built on Amazon SageMaker. As of June 6, 2023, it is the best open-source model currently available. Falcon-40B outperforms LLaMA, StableLM, RedPajama, MPT, etc. To see comparison, see OpenLLM Leaderboard. It features an architecture optimized for inference, with FlashAttention and multiquery.
